title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Democrat governors intent on destroying economy. What will they have left to govern? Cuomo says New York is completely dependent on the federal government. Study: Testicles make men more vulnerable to coronavirus. Fauci bashes protestors. Dr. Birx praises Florida health commissioner. Miami Herald columnist tweets that crowded Florida beaches will kill Trump and DeSantis supporters. Rush goes through research, scientific studies that suggest COVID-19 more widespread than thought, less deadly. Santa Clara study. The more information we get, the more it looks like the shutdown wasn't necessary. UK research. John Lee: No direct evidence lockdowns are working. NJ uses ChiCom drones to spy on citizens for social distancing violations. We shut down entire country based on numbers in NYC. Flu deaths and coronavirus deaths. Dem focus groups say Trump briefings help Trump.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

EIB callers are more informed than those on other shows. Why the oil price collapse is bad news for American energy independence. Colleges suffering. Oil price per barrel is plummeting. Governor Whitmer, Democrat governors are drunk with power. Michelle Obama for VP? Oil futures prices. Environmentalists wackos love the results of the shutdown. Column speculates Biden will pick Michelle Obama as VP, get elected, resign and make her president. The impetus to get rid of Trump has not ended. Bummed out over economic shutdown. The mask as a symbol of fear.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Mask as symbol of fear. How the media uses hurricane models, scares to change behavior. Distrust of experts, authorities. Atlantic writer says Democrat focus groups show WH briefings are helping Trump, misunderstand how he uses the media and abuses them. Idris Elba: Everyone should lock down for a year so we never forget. Rush thinks Trump should do a radio town hall. There are leftists out there who are excited by this lockdown. "Bosch" on Amazon Prime. Rush invites President Trump to do a radio town hall on this show. Why Rush thinks Trump floated the talk radio idea. Brian Rosenwald on Rush's influence on the reputation of mainstream media and "experts".

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
